library.description: Textillate.js combines some awesome libraries to provide an ease-to-use plugin for applying CSS3 animations to any text.
library.name: Textillate

library.description: $.Typewriter w/ nice features like HTML support; also, can mistype, repeat, insert, delete, pause, delay and 'human-like'.
library.name: $.t.js

library.description: A beautiful and functional WYSIWYG HTML text editor with file browser out-of-box
library.name: Jodit Editor

library.description: A text highlighter intended for every use case. Has built-in options for diacritics, separate word search, synonyms, iframes, filters, accuracy, element, class name and more. Can be used with pure JavaScript or as jQuery plugin.
library.name: mark.js

library.description: Fast and correct clip functions for HTML and plain text
library.name: text-clipper
